sources.title: A Woman's Vengeance (1948)
sources.description: A cheating husband is charged in the poisoning death of his invalid wife, in spite of other women and suicide also being suspected. Watch on RetroFlix.org: https://retroflix.org/a-womans-vengeance-1948/

sources.title: A Woman's Vengeance (1948) Charles Boyer, Ann Blyth, Jessica Tandy - Film Noir Full Movie
sources.description: A Woman's Vengeance is a 1948 American film noir drama mystery film directed by Zolt√°n Korda and starring Charles Boyer, Ann Blyth, Jessica Tandy, Cedric Hardwicke, Rachel Kempson, and Mildred Natwick. The screenplay by Aldous Huxley was based on his short story "The Gioconda Smile". Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/A_Woman%27s_Vengeance Suggested Film Noirs : http://bit.ly/36oLNCR The Internet Archive is an excellent choice for entire full length Netflix & YouTube style uploads of drama, mystery, thriller & crime noir movies from the UK & USA for free. metadata.Plot: Country squire Henry Maurier is patient with his wife Emily, a neurotic invalid, but her brother surprises Henry with his young mistress Doris. The same night, Emily dies of her chronic heart disease, and Henry promptly marries Doris, to the chagrin of neighbor Janet Spence, who loves him. When a post-mortem shows that Emily's death was precipitated by arsenic, Henry is placed on trial for his life. But is he guilty?
metadata.Actors: Charles Boyer, Ann Blyth, Jessica Tandy
